channel.title: Need administrator help on removing a server
channel.description:
Hey there,
So a friend of mine had put my server on Moparscape somewhere in December, but for some reason he didn't want to work on it anymore and quit it. I have no access to the account he made the advertisement on and I would like to post a new server running on the same IP since I'm still the owner of the VPS on that IP.
Can someone contact me about the removal of the server so I can make a new one? He already changed the name to 'Remove please'.
Thanks in advance,
Lorenz

item.title: Need administrator help on removing a server
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.source: Need administrator help on removing a server
